verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mercy and truth have met together, Righteousness and peace have kissed each other. In Jesus . . . In Jesus . . . In Jesus The Lamb that was slain.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Truth shall spring out of the earth, Righteousness shall look down from heaven. In Jesus . . . In Jesus . . . In Jesus The Lamb that was slain.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lord, You’ve shown us Your mercy, And You’ve granted unto us Your salvation. In Jesus . . . In Jesus . . . In Jesus The Lamb that was slain.{/lang-eng}
